newsitem.title: USA: Cityscape restates Q2 profits lower.
newsitem.headline: Cityscape restates Q2 profits lower.

text.p: Cityscape Financial Corp said on Thursday that it will restate its second quarter earnings $0.78 a fully diluted share lower to $0.27 a share due to a change of accounting treatment for recent acquisitions from its previously reported $1.05.

The company said it changed its results over the acquisitions of Heritable Finance Group and J&J Securities Ltd and the elimination of revenue recognized during the second quarter on the sale of loan portfolios related to the acquisitions.
Cityscape reduced its total revenues to $38.5 million from $89.4 million, since it cut its gain on the sale of loans to $29.2 million from $80.1 million.
In the year ago second quarter, Cityscape reported revenues of $10.7 million and net income of $2.4 million, or $0.11 a share.
